summary: Following a mysterious suicide at Niagara Falls, a low-rent detective unravels a conspiracy to build a revolutionary invention by enigmatic scientist, Nikola Tesla.
cast: Greg Stuhr|Don Stuhr|Kelsey Siepser|Grant Shaud|Tracey B. Wilson|Brian Mysliwy|Daniela Galli|Harris Yulin|Todd Benzin|Alicja Bachleda|Robert Vaughn|Camilla Belle|Janeane Garofalo|Norm Sham|Vincent O'Neill|Robert Forster|Matthew Broderick|Stephen McKinley Henderson|Joe Grifasi|Wendy Higgins|Patrick Burdick|Dudney Joseph Jr.|Victoria West|Diane Almeter Jones|Elissa Morganti Banas|Jessica Bell|Brian Bernys|Lynn Czekaj|Joe Fishel|Joseph Giambra|Rolando Gomez|Shannon M. Hart|Greg Hinaman|Angel Izard|Steve Losey|Eliza Hayes Maher|Peter Palmisano|Lawrence Salvatore|A.J. Verel|Holly West|Eric Witkowski
title: The American Side
